sense.gloss: dramatic decrease, sharp drop, sudden fall

sdata.j: ↑先進↑↓せんしん↓↑国↑↓こく↓では↑虫歯↑↓むしば↓が|↑激減|↑↓げきげん↓し、↑自分↑↓じぶん↓の↑歯↑↓は↓で↑一生↑↓いっしょう↓↑食↑↓た↓べられる↑人↑↓ひと↓が↑増↑↓ふ↓えています。
sdata.e: Cavities have become rarer in the developed countries and more people will be able to eat with their own teeth throughout their life.
